properties.Name: LifeInsurancePolicyDividend
properties.Description:
A dividend of the associated type made to the Insurance Policy policyowner.

Dividends are the return of part of the premium paid for a policy issued on a participating basis by either a mutual or stock insurer.    It is a portion of the surplus paid to the stockholders of the corporation.

Note:
Dividends are free of income taxation, but interest under a dividend option is taxable in the year the interest is paid.

Columns.Name: InsurancePolicyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Policy.

Columns.Name: DividendOptionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Dividend Option.

Columns.Name: DividendDeclaredDate
Columns.Description: The date that the dividend was declared for payment.

Columns.Name: DividendPaymentDate
Columns.Description: The date of the dividend payment (dividend issued date).

Columns.Name: DividendPaymentAmount
Columns.Description:
The amount of dividend paid.

Dividends are free of income taxation, but interest under a dividend option is taxable in the year the interest is paid.

Columns.Name: InterestComponentAmount
Columns.Description:
The amount of interest that is computed into the associated dividend.

Dividends are free of income taxation, but interest under a dividend option is taxable in the year the interest is paid.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated dividend is paid.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated dividend is paid.

Properties.Description:
A dividend of the associated type made to the Insurance Policy policyowner.

Dividends are the return of part of the premium paid for a policy issued on a participating basis by either a mutual or stock insurer.    It is a portion of the surplus paid to the stockholders of the corporation.

Note:
Dividends are free of income taxation, but interest under a dividend option is taxable in the year the interest is paid.
